page.title: 19Bideford:S+SE.Page 18 Cont.
page.content: __Cont.-There is a B.M.X.track for you- ng enthusiasts at the Pollyfield Centre Competitions freq.occur here at wk.ends An ambulance is on stand by in case of accidents.There are also snooker,darts, and occasional discos at Pollyfields.At McVeighs you can buy everything from ba nanas to baby food,choc.bars paraffin, potatoes and other veg.frozen food and even saucepans.My friend and I walk to school down Churchill Rd.along a footp- ath which ends at Sunnyside,across Bid- eford Bridge and along the quay to Ste- lla Maris Convent.I spend a lot of my time in Weare Giffard where my boy fri- end and other friends live.We go swimm- ing in and canoeing on the R.Torridge, cycling, bell-ringing at Holy Trinity Ch.,and to discos and a recent Â£social' The Churchill Rd.area needs more buses and more entertainment facilities to discourage vandalism.Caroline Foveaux.
